titles.title: King Range National Conservation Area Boundary Expansion Act of 2000
To extend the King Range National Conservation Area boundary in the State of California to include the Mill Creek Forest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 7/25/2000--Introduced. King Range National Conservation Area Boundary Expansion Act of 2000 - Amends Federal law to add Mill Creek lands to the King Range National Conservation Area.
